title: Is Arasaka in war with Militech in Cyberpunk 2077? - Quora

response.answer_text: If they are, then it’s a proxy war. That is on the surface they’d be all smiles, but both sides would be using every means at their disposal to crush any competition, including hiring “outsiders” to complete illegal tasks, whilst being in a position of plausible deniability. There hasn’t been a full-blown corporate war (in the current lore) since 2023. This is a really good source of lore taken from Cyberpunk 2020, Red and 2077 and more… Cyberpunk Timeline
